File libsrc/libmath/ttup.c

Public Functions

ttup 
 int ttup(CrustModel *crust,
          const char *phase,
          double delta,
          double depth,
          double *tt,
          Derivatives *dd)
Compute travel time and derivatives for layered model. Compute travel time and derivatives for upgoing phases in 2 layers over a halfspace. The travel time derivatives are: 
 	Derivatives	*dd	 dd->dtdh : sec/km
 				 dd->dtdd : sec/deg
 				 dd->dpdd : (sec/deg)/deg
 				 dd->dpdh : (sec/deg)/km
 				 dd->dtds0 : d(t)/d(1/v0) : km
 				 dd->dtds1 : d(t)/d(1/v1) : km
 				 dd->dtds2 : d(t)/d(1/v2) : km
 				 dd->dtdh0 : sec/km
 				 dd->dtdh1 : sec/km

Parameters:
crust - A CrustModel with velocities in km/sec, depths in km
phase - The phase name "Px" or "Sx".
delta - The distance in degrees.
depth - The depth in kilometers.
tt - (output) travel time in seconds.
dd - (output) travel time derivatives.
Returns:
0 for success or a nonzero error code: PHASE_UNKNOWN, DELTA_OUTSIDE_RANGE
